title: My Daughter Might Be The Demon King Reincarnated
alternative_title: Reincarnated Mao-chan ; Tensei Mao-chan ; 転生マオちゃん
status: Reincarnated Mao-chan ; Tensei Mao-chan ; 転生マオちゃん
description:
Description :
        Slain and reborn into a typical modern-day household, this story chronicles the daily lives of a mother and her daughter (Former Demon King). Watch as Mao-chan adapts to a brand new world, meeting faces old and new.Originally uploaded on Twicomi, the ebook version of the story comes bundled with another short story by the same author, “Ta-chan and Maa-kun”.
